title: The only support item change I don't agree with
body:
Before the change was made, I liked how I could ping my stacks on {{item:3302}} and {{item:3097}}. To be more specific, I was able to see and ping the cool down of my next available proc so that I don't have to ruin my ADCs farming rhythm by taking a creep he was looking at. 

With the new changes, I can't do that any more. I see how pinging ward charges takes precedence, but before you get to that point, all I can ping is how much gold I have left to proc for to get my wards.

The way I see it, {{item:3302}} is the only gold generating item that can mean lost farm for your carry, since the _only_ way to proc it is minions. {{item:3303}} procs can easily be gained through poke and trading, and {{item:3301}} is just a mini game of picking up after your carry. 

I could totally be the only one who noticed or cares. Just my two cents on the matter.
